keys: departamento de la tienda de comestibles

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Part 2 - Food</string>
            <string language="en">Part 2 - Food</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teil 2 - Nahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partie 2 - Nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parte 2 - Alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte 2 - Alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρος 2 - τρόφιμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Parte 2 - Alimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this part you learn many new words that have to do with food. You also practise how to use English in grocery shops and restaurants.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">In this part you learn many new words that have to do with food. You also practice how to use English in grocery shops and restaurants. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">food</string>
            <string language="sv">café</string>
            <string language="sv">restaurant</string>
            <string language="sv">pizzeria</string>
            <string language="sv">grocery shop</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="en">cafe</string>
            <string language="en">restaurant</string>
            <string language="en">pizzeria</string>
            <string language="en">grocery shop</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Teil erlernen Sie viele neue Wörter, 
die Nahrung miteinbeziehen. Sie üben auch, wie man Englisch in 
den Lebensmittelgeschäftsystemen und -gaststätten verwendet. 
Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - 
wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la présente partie vous apprenez beaucoup 
de nouveaux mots qui doivent faire avec la nourriture. Vous 
pratiquez également comment utiliser l'anglais dans des systèmes et 
des restaurants d'épicerie. Safir - l'anglais et vie active 
pour des débutants - module 2 - combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta parte você aprende muitas palavras novas 
que têm que fazer com alimento. Você pratica também como usar
o inglês em lojas e em restaurantes do mantimento. Safir - vida
do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é 
ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa parte imparate molte nuove parole che 
riguardano alimento. Egualmente vi esercitate in come usare 
l'inglese nei negozi e nei ristoranti della drogheria. Safir - 
inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μέρος μαθαίνετε πολλές νέες λέξεις που 
πρέπει να κάνουν με τα τρόφιμα. Εσείς επίσης πρακτική πώς
να χρησιμοποιήσει τα αγγλικά στα καταστήματα και τα εστιατόρια 
παντοπωλείων. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή
για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta parte usted aprende muchas nuevas 
palabras que tengan que hacer con el alimento. Usted también 
practica cómo utilizar inglés en departamentos y restaurantes de la 
tienda de comestibles. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
